name: Holiday Hair Styling Value Set
about: What it is:¬†An exclusive holiday set of best-selling stylers, including a full-size Hydrating Styling Cream, all featuring nourishing argan oil...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Dryness.- Frizz.- Hold & Style Extending..Key Benefits:¬†- Fights frizz.- Boosts shine.- Maintains hold..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants, it hydrates and nourishes hair...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and sulfates SLS & SLES. These products are also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Hydrating Styling Cream conditions, hydrates, and fights frizz while providing a soft hold. Luminous Hairspray Strong boosts shine and provides a moveable but firm hold for braids and updos. The heat-activated Frizz Shield Spray repels humidity to prevent frizz and flyaways, leaving hair with a smooth, glassy finish. The iconic Moroccanoil Treatment conditions, smooths frizz, and boosts shine by up to 118 percent...This Set Contains:- 10.2 oz/ 300 mL Hydrating Styling Cream.- 2.3 oz/ 75 mL Luminous Hairspray Strong.- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Frizz Shield Spray.- 05. Oz/ 15 mL Moroccanoil Treatment
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Hydrating Styling Cream:.-Apply one to two pumps to damp or dry hair from mid-lengths to ends..-Blow-dry and style as usual, or allow hair to dry naturally...Luminous Hairspray Strong:.-Hold 10 inches from head and spray on dry, styled hair..-For extra volume, spray on roots before styling...Frizz Shield Spray:.-Spray throughout clean, damp hair..-Comb to distribute evenly and blow-dry in sections to activate..-Follow with a flat iron for enhanced anti-frizz benefits..-Frizz Shield Spray should be the last product applied before blow-drying for optimal heat activation...Moroccanoil Treatment:.-Apply a small amount to clean, towel-dried hair, from mid-lengths to ends..-Blow-dry or let dry naturally..-Apply on dry hair to tame flyaways, condition split ends, and smooth hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saved my dry hair! My hair was damaged after my stylist lifted too much color, and using these products stopped it breaking off.
Love it! Obsessed with how these products smell. This is a great set

reviews.review_title: Great value for those trying new products!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me I have long, straight hair that tends to be dry. Loved the hydration cream and frizz spray before blow drying. It leaves my hair so soft and tangle free. Use a tiny amount of oil to give a nice shine. shine.

reviews.review_title: Not sure what to think about this products.

reviews.review_text: Not sure what is wrong with these products as I really wanted to ‚Äúlike it‚Äù. My hair is falling out and are more dry / looks damaged. I only like the oil. I would really like to get into the details of the ingredients and find out what is causing this damage. Very weird. Thx
